snippet.title: Disney OFFICIALLY CONFIRMS Johnny Depp Has Been Rehired After Win Over Amber Heard!!!
snippet.description:
Disney OFFICIALLY CONFIRMS Johnny Depp Has Been Rehired After Win Over Amber Heard!!!

Captain Jack Sparrow, the pirate famously portrayed by Johnny Depp in the well loved Pirates of the Caribbean films, just so happened to be coming to Rare’s Sea of Thieves. Microsoft has just recently announced a free Pirates-themed expansion for the game, which is launching June 22nd, at its Xbox E3 2021 showcase. And fans are already raving about it to say the least. The big news here is that Johnny Depp is making an appearance in the upcoming game as he will be taking on the role of Jack Sparrow and fans believe that signs show this game may possibly led to the rehiring of Johnny Depp for the upcoming Pirates of the Caribbean movie. Allow us to break all the recent news down for you but first be sure to like the video and subscribe to the channel below. 

Click HERE To Enter The GIVEAWAY!
https://www.youtube.com/crazedculture?sub_confirmation=1

#johnnydepp #seaofthieves #justiceforjohnnydepp

You are not required to comment to win the giveaway distributed in the video. It is ONLY a recommendation. You must have a twitter under the same username of youtube in order to qualify to get in contact with you. For more information on giveaways refer to youtube’s contest policies:  
https://support.google.com/youtube/answer/1620498?hl=e
